fields_of_interest: Competition, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: GDPR; artificial intelligence; machine learning; innovation; skills, jobs and growth; future of the internet; data protection; intellectual property and licensing; research and development
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: DeepMind is a world leader in artificial intelligence (AI) research and its application for positive impact. Based in London, we recently announced a new AI lab in Paris - our first in continental Europe. Our mission is to push the boundaries of AI, developing programmes that can learn to solve any complex problem without needing to be taught how - increasing our capacity to tackle some of our most pressing real-world challenges, such as climate change and healthcare.
